title: Efficient serving with ScaNN for retrieval (Building recommendation systems with TensorFlow)
excerpt: In our earlier videos, we showed you how to use the brute force approach in your retrieval system. In this video, we are going to use a more efficient method - Approximate Nearest Neighbours (ANN) and introduce you to the Google ScaNN library.
